text:
The following information is not very obvious when reading the documentation for
the <echo> task and calling "ant -h".  Here's a summary that I believe would be
useful to others.  Can something like it be added to
"docs/manual/CoreTasks/echo.html"?

Command line argument "-quiet" echoes:

    <echo message="This is error message." level="error" />
    <echo message="This is warning message." />
    <echo message="This is warning message." level="warning" />

No command line argument echoes:

    <echo message="This is error message." level="error" />
    <echo message="This is warning message." />
    <echo message="This is warning message." level="warning" />
    <echo message="This is info message." level="info" />

Command line argument "-verbose" echoes:

    <echo message="This is error message." level="error" />
    <echo message="This is warning message." />
    <echo message="This is warning message." level="warning" />
    <echo message="This is info message." level="info" />
    <echo message="This is verbose message." level="verbose" />

Command line argument "-debug" echoes:
 
    <echo message="This is error message." level="error" />
    <echo message="This is warning message." />
    <echo message="This is warning message." level="warning" />
    <echo message="This is info message." level="info" />
    <echo message="This is verbose message." level="verbose" />
    <echo message="This is debug message." level="debug" />
creator: jay@vtgroup.com
